I pressed the issue home to them.
The tabloid press ran the story.
The press as always gave him a free pass as with so many other issues.
The winter issue is hot off the press.
words.defineEn: to force the juice out of fruit or vegetables by squeezing them
words.defineVi: để buộc nước ra khỏi trái cây hoặc rau quả bằng cách ép chúng

examples: Pass the salt, please.
He put salt into the sugar bowl by mistake.
Can you please pass the salt?
The soup needed a little more salt to bring out the taste.
Take a stock tip with a grain of salt.
words.defineEn: to add salt to food or another substance in order to enhance its flavor
words.defineVi: để thêm muối vào thực phẩm hoặc chất khác để tăng hương vị của nó

examples: The scales have finally fallen from his eyes and he realises that he's made a dreadful mistake.
These great men on the wall had done so much to tip the scales in justice's favor.
I favor anything that tilts the scales in my direction.
It was only when he was arrested for theft that the scales fell from my eyes and I realised where his money came from.
Scaling a building.
words.defineEn: pattern, make, regulate, set, measure, or estimate according to some rate or standard
words.defineVi: mô hình, thực hiện, điều chỉnh, thiết lập, đo lường hoặc ước tính theo một số tỷ lệ hoặc tiêu chuẩn

examples: Current drilling technology thus barely scrapes the surface.
You really are scraping the bottom of the barrel!
I barely scraped the surface of everything there was to do and see.
She used a knife to scrape the hull off the coconut to reveal the white flesh inside.
No one will respect those who bows and scrapes every day.
words.defineEn: cut the surface of; wear away the surface of
words.defineVi: cắt bề mặt của; mài mòn bề mặt của

examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.
The season starts in September.
She seasoned the meat with herbs and spices before cooking.
Tomatoes are out of season now.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to add spices or salt to food to make it taste better
words.defineVi: thêm gia vị hoặc muối vào thức ăn để làm cho nó ngon hơn

examples: She planted rutabaga seeds in her garden.
She blended pumpkin seeds into a creamy pesto sauce.
She carefully sprinkled sunflower seeds on top of her homemade bread dough.
He's sowing the seeds of his own downfall.
They have planted the seeds of their own destruction.
words.defineEn: to remove the seeds from a fruit or vegetable
words.defineVi: để loại bỏ các hạt từ một loại trái cây hoặc rau

examples: Wow, Anna has really come out of her shell lately.
Derek has really come out of his shell since he started working here.
It took patience and precision to crack open the tough shell of the single-leaf pinyon pine cone.
Use cottage cheese as a substitute for ricotta cheese in recipes like stuffed shells or lasagna.
I found a cob of hazelnuts lying on the ground and eagerly started shelling them.
words.defineEn: remove from its shell or outer covering

examples: Don't forget to sprinkle some shredded cheese on the pizza as a tasty topping.

Orlando shredded the pro’s.
words.defineEn: tear into shreds
words.defineVi: xé thành mảnh vụn

examples: I just sifted my two flours.
Robotic mining rigs can sift the lunar dust for organic molecules and could be used to build huge structures way too massive to be brought from Earth.
I'm gonna sift the flour, baking soda, sugar, and salt.
If we could sift the lunar dust for helium, We'd have enough fuel to power the entire world for thousands of years.
There's a great fear that this partisanship of Washington institutions and the legislature and the executive is sifting over to the courts.
words.defineEn: separate by passing through a sieve or other straining device to separate out coarser elements

examples: Its skin feels really smooth.
The bite had scarcely broken the skin.
The bite had scarcely broken the skin.
The milk skin gives a unique texture to the homemade pudding.

words.defineVi: để loại bỏ da hoặc lớp bên ngoài từ một cái gì đó

words.defineVi: thêm các loại thảo mộc hoặc gia vị vào

examples: My dad spread a thick layer of orange marmalade on my morning toast.
The children spread cheese dip on crackers during their picnic in the park.
She spread a thick layer of tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
I spread a layer of brown sauce on my sandwich.
She spread a dollop of cocktail sauce on her oysters.
words.defineEn: to put a layer of a smooth or soft substance over a surface
words.defineVi: để đặt một lớp chất mịn hoặc mềm trên một bề mặt

examples: She stirred the creamy mushroom sauce into her pasta.

She carefully stirred her tea, watching the sugar cube dissolve slowly.
The chef prepared a mouthwatering teff stir-fry, incorporating flavorful spices and vegetables.
He stirred butterscotch chips into his pancake batter, resulting in a stack of fluffy and caramelized pancakes.
words.defineEn: to move a spoon, etc. around in a liquid or other substance to completely mix it
words.defineVi: di chuyển thìa, v.v. xung quanh chất lỏng hoặc chất khác để trộn hoàn toàn

examples: The children skipped stones across the calm river surface.

The stone made a dent in the roof of the car.
The houses are built out of local stone.
The baker skillfully removed the stone from the apricot, preparing it for a delicious pie.
words.defineEn: remove the pits from
words.defineVi: loại bỏ các hố từ

words.defineEn: to remove the tops and tails or ends of something, such as trimming the stems and leaves from vegetables

examples: She tossed mustard sprouts into her salad for a crunchy texture and a hint of spiciness.

I tossed the roasted vegetables with olive oil and a sprinkle of salt and pepper.
He won the toss so he started the game.

examples: Everything you need to know, from trussing the bird to carving it.

examples: he whipped off his coat.

words.defineEn: to quickly beat cream or eggs until stiff
words.defineVi: để nhanh chóng đánh kem hoặc trứng cho đến khi cứng

examples: Make sure your bowl and whisks are as clean as a whistle.

Then her dad came and whisked her away.
words.defineEn: whip with or as if with a wire whisk
words.defineVi: quất bằng hoặc như thể bằng roi dây

examples: And that buzzing sound you might hear as a dragonfly whizzes by?

Even though the young protagonist wasn't malicious, the idea that computer whizzes could gain access to systems like this terrified the public.
